description: Wear Mammut, be Mammut – every day. Whether for hiking, climbing, or everyday wear, this classic Logowear tee is all about channeling that great outdoor vibe. Boasting a topographical logo backing, it matches your irrepressible curiosity and sense of adventure. Pleasantly light with a soft hand-feel, it’s a quick-drying and sweat-wicking staple that goes with just about everything.
name: Mammut Mammut Core T-Shirt Unexplored - Mens
